definition: to invigorate the country through science and education
branch of study/administrative section/division/field/branch/stage directions/family (taxonomy)/rules/laws/to mete out (punishment)/to levy (taxes etc)/to fine sb/CL:個|个[ge4]
feeling or desire to do sth/interest in sth/excitement
to rise/to flourish/to become popular/to start/to encourage/to get up/(often used in the negative) to permit or allow (dialect)/maybe (dialect)

sentences.english: Century through science and education in mind, even more powerful and promote development.
sentences.chinese: 科教興國百年記，如虎添翼促發展。

sentences.english: This is our country through science and education strategy for the inevitable demand.
sentences.chinese: 這是我國實施科教興國戰略的必然要求。
